author: kaz
msg: Updating to velocity-dvsl-0.43.  This is the latest and greatest that
has a feature required to determine relative paths from within a
template.  It passes the filename (relative to the basedir attribute of
the dvsl task) of the current document being processed into the context

author: brekke
msg: Along the same lines as the junit report target dependency change.  The generation of the reports does not need to depend on the compile target.  This again will allow the documention to be generated even if the source is not compiling.
